text: Raymond Gordon Collier (born 25 October 1961) is a Canadian rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Cranbrook, British Columbia Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1987 Pan American Games
title: Raymond Collier
